N-no, you can't...!"},{"lineNumber":28730,"originalJapaneseLine":"　要請があって、軽犯罪者はもう組み込んでます。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the request, we've already incorporated petty criminals."},{"lineNumber":28731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those remaining are mostly serious criminals...\""},{"lineNumber":28732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「構わん、生き残ったら無罪放免だと言ってやれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It doesn't matter; tell them they'll be pardoned if they survive.\""},{"lineNumber":28733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、ッ……だめ、だめです……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no... no, you can't...!"},{"lineNumber":28734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どの犯罪者も、ひどい罪を犯した人ばかりで……！","translatedEnglishLine":"All of them have committed terrible crimes...!"},{"lineNumber":28735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無罪放免なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Pardoning them is...\""},{"lineNumber":28636,"originalJapaneseLine":"燃えるような瞳で、シーラがランスを見据える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela looked at Rance with burning eyes."},{"lineNumber":28637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばーか。勘違いするな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool. Don't misunderstand."},{"lineNumber":28638,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし生き残ったら俺様が退治してやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"If they survive, I'll personally deal with them."},{"lineNumber":28639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……それ、は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... that is...\""},{"lineNumber":28640,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマンが無罪にしようが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if Herman pardons them,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……わざわざ、面倒な事を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... going out of your way for such a troublesome matter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……頑固な奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph... stubborn fellow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……ヘルマンの民を、お預けします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance... I entrust the people of Herman to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: …………よろしくお願いします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Please take good care of them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぺこりと、シーラはランスに頭を下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela bowed her head politely to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの指示により、7万ほどの新兵が加わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By Rance's orders, about 70,000 new soldiers were added.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵が足りん！　足りんのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The troops are not enough! They are not enough!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ううう……は、はい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-uhh... y-yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストレス解消に、ランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To relieve stress, Rance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラを立たせてお尻を撫で続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: made Sheela stand and continued to stroke her backside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、これ以上は……厳しいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, beyond this point... it's difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃちいところを絞っても意味はないのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Squeezing out small places is meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か、でかいところを探さないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to find something big..."
"Y-yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼しますよ、シーラ様……げ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Excuse me, Lady Sheela... ugh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 書類に目を落としたまま入ってきたペルエレが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere entered, eyes fixed on paperwork,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの姿を認めて露骨に嫌な顔をした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and upon recognizing Rance, made an openly displeased face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。世界総統のおなりだぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. The World's Supreme Governor has arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひざまずいて感謝するがいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should kneel and give thanks."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただの痴漢にしか見えないんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But he just looks like a simple pervert to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……急ぎの書類とか、ある？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-um... do you have any urgent documents?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、ううん、特には……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, no, not really...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 例の収容所の件で、一応承認のハンコが今日中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding the matter of the detention center, we need an approval stamp within today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、そうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、収容所って？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's that, a detention center?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それまで収容していた収容所が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The detention center that was holding them until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先日の戦闘の際にあちこち破壊されまして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was damaged in many places during the recent battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、別の場所に一時的に移送を、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So they are temporarily transferring them to another location."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、囚人どもか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, prisoners huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、忙しくシーラのお尻で動いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While busily moving with Sheela's backside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの手が止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's hand stopped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス様？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだ！　囚人を使おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's it! Let's use the prisoners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこう人数いるんだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's quite a number of them, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええ。全部で数万人はいますけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes. There are tens of thousands in total, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使うというと……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use them, you say...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そいつら、軍に組み込め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incorporate them into the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に送り込め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send them to the front lines."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ……！　あ、だ、だめです……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh...! N-no, you can't...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要請があって、軽犯罪者はもう組み込んでます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the request, we've already incorporated petty criminals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those remaining are mostly serious criminals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「構わん、生き残ったら無罪放免だと言ってやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It doesn't matter; tell them they'll be pardoned if they survive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、ッ……だめ、だめです……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no... no, you can't...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どの犯罪者も、ひどい罪を犯した人ばかりで……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of them have committed terrible crimes...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無罪放免なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pardoning them is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 燃えるような瞳で、シーラがランスを見据える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela looked at Rance with burning eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばーか。勘違いするな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fool. Don't misunderstand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし生き残ったら俺様が退治してやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they survive, I'll personally deal with them.
"Eh... that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンが無罪にしようが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if Herman pardons them,

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの手が止まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's hand stopped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス様？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだ！　囚人を使おう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's it! Let's use the prisoners.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けっこう人数いるんだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's quite a number of them, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、ええ。全部で数万人はいますけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes. There are tens of thousands in total, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使うというと……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use them, you say...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そいつら、軍に組み込め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incorporate them into the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に送り込め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send them to the front lines."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ……！　あ、だ、だめです……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh...! N-no, you can't...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要請があって、軽犯罪者はもう組み込んでます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the request, we've already incorporated petty criminals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残っているのは重犯罪者ばかりで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those remaining are mostly serious criminals..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「構わん、生き残ったら無罪放免だと言ってやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It doesn't matter; tell them they'll be pardoned if they survive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、ッ……だめ、だめです……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no... no, you can't...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どの犯罪者も、ひどい罪を犯した人ばかりで……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of them have committed terrible crimes...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無罪放免なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pardoning them is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 燃えるような瞳で、シーラがランスを見据える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela looked at Rance with burning eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばーか。勘違いするな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fool. Don't misunderstand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし生き残ったら俺様が退治してやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they survive, I'll personally deal with them.
"Eh... that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンが無罪にしようが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if Herman pardons them,
